title: Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | SB 1.7.12 | 27-12-2021
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: Om Agyana Timiran Dasya Gyanan Janishalakaya
Chaksharan Militam Yena Tasvai Shri Gurave Namaha
Nama Om Vishnupadaya Krishna Preshtaya Bhutale
Shri Mate Vaktivedanta Swamin Nithinamine
Namaste Saraswate Deve Gauravani Pracharine
Nirvishesha Shunyavadi Pashchatyade Shatarine
Jaya Shri Krishna Chaitanya Prabhu Nithyananda
Shri Advaita Gadadhara Shiva Sadhi Gauravakta Vrinda
Hare Krishna Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare
Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare
Om Namo Bhagavate Vasudevaya
Janmadhyasya Yatonvaya Ditaratash Chartheshabhignya Svarat
Narayanam Namaskritya
Naram Chai Vanarottamam
Deveem Saraswateem Vyasam Tatho Jaya Mudhirayet

There is a class of less intelligent devotees of Bhagavata Purana who desire to relish at once the activities of the Lord narrated in the 10th canto without first understanding the primary cantos.
